net.petterroea.starterkit

Class Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.petterroea.starterkit.Packet

  • public class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic packet class. Extend this and make your own class for each type of packet.
    Author:
    petterroea
